de.tudresden.inf.rn.mobilis.sea.pubsub.model.tree.leaves.interfaces

Interface ICurrentHeatMapData

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatisticsFacade

    public interface ICurrentHeatMapData
    This is an auxiliary interface to declare some methods which may be done on a CurrentHeatMapData Node

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void registerPlayerHeatMap(int id, int width, int height)
      Register a new heatmap for a player (specified by the id of the player).
      void registerTeamHeatMap(java.lang.String firstTeamname, java.lang.String secondTeamname, int width, int height)
      Register a new heatmap for a team (specified by the name of the team).
      void setValueInHeatMap(int id, int x, int y, int value)
      Set a value in the heatmap at the specified position.
      void setValueInHeatMap(java.lang.String teamname, int x, int y, int value)
      Set a value in the heatmap at the specified position.

    • Method Detail

      • registerPlayerHeatMap

        void registerPlayerHeatMap(int id,
                         int width,
                         int height)
        Register a new heatmap for a player (specified by the id of the player). It is mandatory to call this method before setting any data in the heatmap with such an id
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the player
        width - the width of the heatmap (fields on the x-axis)
        height - the height of the heatmap (fields on the y-axis)

      • registerTeamHeatMap

        void registerTeamHeatMap(java.lang.String firstTeamname,
                       java.lang.String secondTeamname,
                       int width,
                       int height)
        Register a new heatmap for a team (specified by the name of the team). It is mandatory to call this method before setting any data in the heatmap with such a name
        Parameters:
        firstTeamname - the name of the first team
        secondTeamname - the name of the second team
        width - the width of the heatmap (fields on the x-axis)
        height - the height of the heatmap (fields on the y-axis)

      • setValueInHeatMap

        void setValueInHeatMap(int id,
                     int x,
                     int y,
                     int value)
        Set a value in the heatmap at the specified position. If the x or y value is not within the grid of the heatmap no changes will be applied. The heatmap must be registered first ( StatisticsFacade.registerPlayerHeatMap(id,width,height)). Otherwise nothing will be published
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the player
        x - the x position within the grid (where to set the new value)
        y - the y position within the grid (where to set the new value)
        value - the value which should be set

      • setValueInHeatMap

        void setValueInHeatMap(java.lang.String teamname,
                     int x,
                     int y,
                     int value)
        Set a value in the heatmap at the specified position. If the x or y value is not within the grid of the heatmap no changes will be applied. The heatmap must be registered first ( StatisticsFacade.registerTeamHeatMap(id,width,height)). Otherwise nothing will be published
        Parameters:
        teamname - the name of the first team
        x - the x position within the grid (where to set the new value)
        y - the y position within the grid (where to set the new value)
        value - the value which should be set
